synopsis.text: Ueno's genius is undeniable as the head of her middle school's science club, where she crafts extraordinary inventions capable of everything from purifying liquids to generating dark matter. Despite her intellect, she finds herself stumped by one elusive concept: love. Ueno harbors deep feelings for Tanaka, a fellow club member, but her attempts to express her affection through her eccentric gadgets always seem to backfire. With the help of her stoic friend Yamashita, Ueno embarks on a quest to create the perfect situation to capture Tanaka's heart, even if it means resorting to risqu√© tactics. Will Ueno's inventive spirit lead her to the love she desires, or will her schemes only push Tanaka further away? Join Ueno on her hilarious and heartwarming journey to discover the one thing she can't seem to invent: the perfect confession.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
